short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension that auto-clicks on "continue without supporting"/similar phrases when given a popup about disabling ad blocking.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that auto-clicks on "continue without supporting" or similar phrases when given a popup about disabling ad blocking. You can now spend less time trying to find the small continue text and more time actually using the website!
